about_the_game:
The mainstream of games which combines RPG and matching on the market are practically relying on numerical value. The part of matching and fighting the enemy are relatively independent. Thus, the strategic performance in the game is not so strong. We consider that there should be a better way to present and combine such RPG and matching games. And it can not only show the meaning of RPG, but can also show the relaxing entertainment of matching game.


  • A unique three-game RPG
Only three pieces in the correct position can kill the enemy in the corresponding position.
Step-by-step turn-based combat brings a sense of urgency and excitement.

  • Rogue-like elements
Random enemies, random plot quests...
Victory in guessing boxing, sailing expeditions, escape from the chamber of secrets, each is a new experience.

  • A diverse mix of strategies
Hero x arms x relics x props, mix up dozens of different schools build
Hero skills, arms characteristics, relics, props...... There is a kaleidoscope of combinations.

  • Rich plot full of laughter and tears
Eight maps, together constitute a unique "tallroad" style silly funny than the story line,
Among them also interspersed with a variety of touching and warm stories.
Savor it, and you'll learn more.

reviews:
“We often say that games need innovation, and players need updated game modes. But from "Miao Lian Qian Qian", we can see that by combining traditional modes, it can bring players an updated game experience. As far as the "Three Matches" itself is concerned, it is already difficult to develop in depth. As far as Roguelike is concerned, the content of this game is not too rich, but the combination of these two modes into a game After the basic disk, it did bring us a good experience.”
3DM

“If you are a fan of "Three Matches" games, then "Miao Lian Qian Jun" is your unquestionable choice. Slowly feel the integration of Roguelike gameplay into RPG Match 3 works. If you are all pursuit of plot, this work It can also bring you the feeling like a contemporary allegorical story!”
游戏媒体 Gamediary

“The combination of matching and roguelike is not only to increase the difficulty of the game, but also cleverly achieves the effect of 1 + 1 greater than 2, turning casual games into strategy games, increasing its playability and fun.”
小黑盒
short_description: Join us for an epic adventure spanning the six realms of man! Build your squad for thrilling tactical match-3 action! Strife plagues the land, and only one bold adventurer has what it takes to unravel the mysteries overtaking the world.
